sentences.english: The city is noted for its handicrafts. Population, 745,000.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市以手工藝品著名。

sentences.english: This paper also discusses the framework of forecasting the induced passenger flow volume in URT.
sentences.chinese: 給出了城市軌道交通誘增交通量預測框架。

sentences.english: Helena is the capital and Billings the largest city. Population, 803, '55.
sentences.chinese: 赫勒拿是該州首府，比林斯是最大城市。

sentences.english: It is also named green architecture of city cave-house.
sentences.chinese: 這種建築也可稱爲“城市窯洞”式綠色建築。

sentences.english: In the beginning the quarries lay far beyond the city limits.
sentences.chinese: 起初採石場還遠離城市的邊界。

sentences.english: I love to meet up with my friends, get out of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡和朋友們聚在一起，離開城市的喧囂。

sentences.english: The city's in surrender and they're falling at your feet.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市的敗者，他們拜倒在你的石榴裙下。

sentences.english: Young heirs to future-hold, city grows more radiant.
sentences.chinese: 青年累代承未來，城市連年添華彩。

sentences.english: Big opportunities seen in small cities.
sentences.chinese: 中國小城市家電市場潛能巨大。

sentences.english: The leaders of the city always boast that the city is the most suitable place for human beings to live.
sentences.chinese: 海口市當局總是吹噓這個城市最適合人類居住。

sentences.english: It soon turned into black smog as the smoke of the city poured into the air.
sentences.chinese: 隨着城市的煙排入天空，白霧很快變成了黑色煙霧。

sentences.english: L2. Due to the destination is an inland city, we have to arrange sea-land intermodal transportation.
sentences.chinese: 由於目的地是內陸城市，我們只好安排海陸聯運。

sentences.english: I have to be in the city.
sentences.chinese: 我是非待在城市不可的人。

sentences.english: Sydney has become the most expensive Australian city for expatriates.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼已成爲最昂貴的澳大利亞移民城市。

sentences.english: Construction cranes clutter the skylines of booming Chinese cities.
sentences.chinese: 繁榮城市的工地上起重機鬧哄哄。

sentences.english: Finally we calculated standard land price of Han Cheng's commercial land in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 最終測算出2002年韓城市城區商業用地基準地價。
